name: Chapter Opener
description: Full-width section divider with part number and chapter title, used to signal major narrative transitions in documents with 3+ sections. Forces a page break before to ensure clean separation.
components: Chapter title: $heading-06 or $heading-05 for primary heading
Decorative rule: 2px $blue-60 horizontal line, $spacing-03 below part number
rules: Force page break BEFORE every chapter opener — it must always start on a new page
Part number uses $label-01 with $text-05 color and 2px letter-spacing for quiet authority
Chapter title uses $heading-06 for major sections or $heading-05 for subsections
Decorative rule (2px solid $blue-60) sits between part number and title, spanning 25% of page width
Maximum 4-5 chapter openers per document — more creates excessive white space
Only use in documents with 3+ distinct sections; for shorter docs use heading hierarchy instead
Bottom margin of $spacing-09 (48px) before first content element on the page
Never pair with another full-width component immediately after — follow with offset content

printBehavior.pagePosition: start of new recto (right) page when possible
printBehavior.bleedHandling: decorative rule does not extend to bleed

accessibilityNotes: Chapter title must use the appropriate heading level (<h2> for main chapters) — maintain document outline
Part number label should be visually present but can be combined with heading via aria-label
Decorative horizontal rule must have role='presentation' — it's visual rhythm, not content separation
Ensure the chapter opener is navigable via bookmark/outline in the generated PDF
antiPatterns: Never use chapter openers in documents with fewer than 3 sections — it fragments short content
Never exceed 5 chapter openers per document — too many breaks disrupt reading flow
Never follow a chapter opener with another full-width (colSpan 16) component — use offset content for rhythm
Never omit the page break before — a chapter opener mid-page looks like an ordinary heading
Never use $heading-07 or $display-01 for chapter titles — those are reserved for the cover page
